historical_ledger_patterns.description: Sample recent ledger (100255927) with 50+ transactions, mostly Payments and OfferCreates.

patterns.transaction_types: Predominantly Payments (cross-currency, XRP), OfferCreates (DEX orders), some Escrows, Checks.
patterns.frequency: ~50 tx per ledger, closed every ~4 seconds.
patterns.hashes: Unique tx hashes, ledger hash for validation.
patterns.metadata: Includes affected nodes (account changes, offer modifications).
patterns.validation: Validated ledger with close time, total_coins.

historical_ledger_patterns.insights: High activity in DEX and payments; use ledger method with transactions=true for full history. For patterns, analyze tx types over time for trends like AMM usage or NFT trades.
